abstractText: A single palm-leaf folio of an unidentified work. This fragment seems to contain the beginning of a Buddhist tantric text, as the initial invocation reads "oṃ namaḥ cakrasamvārāya". Only one side is written.
abstractShort: A single palm-leaf folio of an unidentified work. This fragment seems to contain the beginning of a Buddhist tantric text,
title: Unidentified fragment
